page.title: 11Emmanuel Church, Southill.
page.content:
{Emmanuel Church}was{built in 1973}it {cost Â£24,000}they are thinking of having an{extension built}which will cost{Â£38,000. {Mr Hancock is our vicar. At Emmanuel church there is an{organ and a{piano.}As{Emmanuel church}is{new it looks quite{different to St.Annes and the{older churches. Emmanuel church has{not got stained {glass windows}like the older churches.Mr.Hancock has not got enough money for them.The{church has services {on Sundays from 10am to 11.30am.}It has one every{Sunday evening}as well. It is like a{community church.
Tracy Phillips.
